editionStmt.p: The initial version of this file was created from data kindly provided by the Ethiopic Manuscript Imaging Project directed by Steve Delamarter.

publicationStmt.publisher: Die Schriftkultur des christlichen Äthiopiens und Eritreas: Eine multimediale Forschungsumgebung / Beta maṣāḥǝft

licence.p: This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0.

msContents.summary: Excerpt from God Reigns, እግዚአብሔር፡ ነግሠ፡ (ነግሥ፡) (f. i v-ii v); God Reigns, እግዚአብሔር፡ ነግሠ፡ (ነግሥ፡) (f-15v); Image of John the Baptist, መልክአ፡ ዮሐንስ፡ መጥምቅ፡ (Chaîne, Répertoire 279) incipit: በስመ: እግዚአብሔር: እሳት: (f-20r); Image of Gäbrä Mänfas Qəddus, መልክአ፡ ገብረ፡ መንፈስ፡ ቅዱስ፡, (Chaîne, Répertoire 196) incipit ሰላም: ለጽንሰትከ: መሠረተ: ነገር: ወውጣኔ: (f-23v); Image of the Savior of the World, መልክአ፡ መድኃኔ፡ ዓለም፡ (Chaîne, Répertoire 164) incipit, ዘኢረከቡ: ተፍጻሜተ: (f-30v); Image of the Trinity, መልክአ፡ ሥላሴ፡ (Chaîne, Répertoire 20) incipit, ሰላም: ለሕላዌክሙ: ዘይመውእ: ህላዌያተ: (f-39r); Image of Michael, መልክአ፡ ሚካኤል፡ (Chaîne, Répertoire 119) incipit, ምስለ: ስመ: ልዑል: ዘተሳተፈ: (f-46r); Image of Mary’s Assumption, መልክአ፡ ፍልሰታ፡ ለማርያም፡ (Chaîne, Répertoire 213) incipit, ሰላም: ለፍልሰተ: ሥጋኪ: ወለነፍስኪ: መዋቲ: (f-48v); Image of the Praises of Mary, መልክአ፡ ውዳሴ፡ (Chaîne, Répertoire 398) incipit, ፈቀደ: እግዚእ: ለአዳም: ያግዕዞ: (f-60r); Image of the Passion of the Cross, መልክአ፡ ሕማማት፡ (Chaîne, Répertoire 91) incipit, ሰላም: ለኪ: ማርያም: ድንግል: ዘመዓዛ: አፉኪ: ኮል: (f-74r); Hymn to Saint George, “Greeting to You, George of Lydda,” ሰላም: ለከ: ጊዮርጊስ: ዘልዳ: (Chaine, Répertoire 83) (); Image of Peter and Paul, መልክአ: ጴጥሮስ: ወጳውሎስ:, incomplete at the end (Chaîne, Répertoire 87) incipit, ሰላም: ለዝክረ: ስምክሙ: ዘአልባስጥሮስ: አፈው: (f-81v); Image of Gäbrä Krestos, መልክአ፡ ገብረ፡ ክርስቶስ። (Chaîne, Répertoire 127) incipit: ሰላም: ለዝክረ: ስምከ: በስመ: ወልደ: አምላክ: ዘተጸውዓ: (f-84v); Image of Honorable Saints, መልክአ: ቅዱሳን: ኄራን: (no Chaîne, Répertoire, number) incipit: በእንተ: ኢየሱስ: ክርስቶስ: ወበእንተ: ድንግል: መፆሩ: (f-88v)

revisionDesc.change: Created XML record from EMIP Collection Metadata.xsls
